title: How to make the perfect playlist
description: So you're planning the perfect candlelit evening — or the perfect road trip, or the perfect afternoon at home. Where do you start? A playlist, of course. NPR Music's Bobby Carter showed us how he crafts them. (This episode originally ran in December 2020.)
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
